attributes.action: Ban cyclists from running red lights
attributes.additional_details: CACRR (Campaign against Cyclists Running Reds) would like to petition to ban all cyclists from running red lights. This blatent disregard for law and people's safety causes injuries, traffic violations and emotional trauma.

rejection.details: As the petition observes, the law is already clear on this issue.  You may wish to recast the petition to call on the Government to enforce the law.
